Sentencas: To control the temperature distribution in the Ni-YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) anode of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) by efficiently utilizing the heat generated by electrochemical reactions, the supply of methane-ammonia mixed fuel is proposed.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The reaction characteristics of reforming/decomposition of the mixed fuel on a Ni-YSZ catalyst are experimentally investigated.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A mixture gas of methane, steam, ammonia, and balance argon is supplied to a packed bed catalyst placed in a quartz tube in an electric furnace.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The crushed Ni-YSZ anode of SOFCs is used as the catalyst.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The exhaust gas composition is analyzed by gas chromatography and the streamwise temperature distribution of the catalyst bed is measured by an infrared camera.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that ammonia decomposition preferentially proceeds and steam methane reforming becomes active after sufficient ammonia has been consumed.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A low-temperature region is formed by steam methane reforming owing to its strongly endothermic nature.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its position moves downstream while its magnitude decreases as the ammonia concentration in the fuel increases.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This shows that the local temperature distribution can be controlled by tuning the ratio of methane to ammonia in the mixed fuel.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also found that, at a certain mixture ratio, the mixed fuel realizes a hydrogen production rate higher than that for only methane or ammonia.
Titulo: Direct reforming of Methane-Ammonia mixed fuel on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells
